title: The Beatitudes: Those Who Mourn
description:
Readings from:

Matthew 5:4

Isaiah 61:1-3

Revelation 21:3-4

Today's passages were read by Jennifer Clark. Jennifer stays home with her 2 kids and her favorite book of the Bible is Luke.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
